span.span: Creates a that represents an arithmetic addition operation that does not have overflow checking.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成的 具有设置为实现方法的 属性。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 属性设置为节点的类型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果节点已提升，则 和 属性均 `true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否则，它们 `false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 属性为 `null`。The property is `null`. 以下信息描述了实现方法、节点类型以及节点是否已提升。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 实现方法Implementing Method 以下规则确定为操作选定的实现方法：The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation: - 如果 `left` 或 `right` 的 属性表示重载加法运算符的用户定义类型，则表示该方法的 是实现方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the addition operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否则，如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为 `null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 节点类型和提升和非提升Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果不 `null`实现方法：If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型可分配给实现方法的相应参数类型，不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果满足以下两个条件，则会提升节点，并且该节点的类型为与实现方法的返回类型对应的可以为 null 的类型：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型既是值类型，其中至少有一个可为 null，并且相应的不可为 null 的类型等于实现方法的相应参数类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型不可以为 null，则不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是预定义的加法运算符的结果类型。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined addition operator. - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型均可为 null，则提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 节点的类型是与预定义的加法运算符的结果类型对应的可以为 null 的类型。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined addition operator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个表达式来添加两个整数。The following code example shows how to create an expression that adds two integers. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionDev10#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.linq.expressions.expressiondev10/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionDev10#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.linq.expressions.expressiondev10/vb/module1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成的 具有设置为实现方法的 属性。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 属性设置为节点的类型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果节点已提升，则 和 属性均 `true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否则，它们 `false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 属性为 `null`。The property is `null`. 以下信息描述了实现方法、节点类型以及节点是否已提升。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 实现方法Implementing Method 以下规则确定操作的实现方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果 `left` 或 `right` 的 属性表示重载加法运算符的用户定义类型，则表示该方法的 是实现方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the addition operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否则，如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为 `null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 节点类型和提升和非提升Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果不 `null`实现方法：If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型可分配给实现方法的相应参数类型，不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果满足以下两个条件，则会提升节点，并且该节点的类型为与实现方法的返回类型对应的可以为 null 的类型：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型既是值类型，其中至少有一个可为 null，并且相应的不可为 null 的类型等于实现方法的相应参数类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型不可以为 null，则不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是预定义的加法运算符的结果类型。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined addition operator. - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型均可为 null，则提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 节点的类型是与预定义的加法运算符的结果类型对应的可以为 null 的类型。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined addition operator.

如果满足以下两个条件，则会提升节点，并且该节点的类型为与实现方法的返回类型对应的可以为 null 的类型：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型既是值类型，其中至少有一个可为 null，并且相应的不可为 null 的类型等于实现方法的相应参数类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型不可以为 null，则不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是预定义的加法运算符的结果类型。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined addition operator. - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型均可为 null，则提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 节点的类型是与预定义的加法运算符的结果类型对应的可以为 null 的类型。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined addition operator.

如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型可分配给实现方法的相应参数类型，不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果满足以下两个条件，则会提升节点，并且该节点的类型为与实现方法的返回类型对应的可以为 null 的类型：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型既是值类型，其中至少有一个可为 null，并且相应的不可为 null 的类型等于实现方法的相应参数类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable, and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型是相同的布尔类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are the same Boolean type. - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型不可为 null，则不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是预定义的条件 `AND` 运算符的结果类型。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined conditional `AND` operator. - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型可以为 null，则提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are nullable, the node is lifted. 节点的类型是与预定义条件 `AND` 运算符的结果类型对应的可以为 null 的类型。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined conditional `AND` operator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个表达式，该表达式仅在第一个操作数的计算结果为 `true`时才对其两个操作数执行逻辑 AND 运算。The following code example shows how to create an expression that performs a logical AND operation on its two operands only if the first operand evaluates to `true`. 如果 `method` 未 `null` 并且它表示采用两个自变量的非 void、`static``Shared` （Visual Basic）方法，则它是节点的实现方法。If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node. - 否则，如果 `left` 或 `right` 的 属性表示重载按位 `AND` 运算符的用户定义类型，则表示该方法的 是实现方法。Otherwise, if the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the bitwise `AND` operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. > [!NOTE] > 不能在或 Visual Basic 中C#重载条件 `AND` 运算符。The conditional `AND` operator cannot be overloaded in C# or Visual Basic. 不过，条件 `AND` 运算符使用按位 `AND` 运算符进行计算。However, the conditional `AND` operator is evaluated by using the bitwise `AND` operator. 因此，按位 `AND` 运算符的用户定义的重载可以是此节点类型的实现方法。Thus, a user-defined overload of the bitwise `AND` operator can be the implementing method for this node type. - 否则，如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型是布尔类型，则实现方法为 `null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 节点类型和提升和非提升Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果不 `null`实现方法：If the implementing method is not `null`: - 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型是相同的布尔类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are the same Boolean type. - remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要表示对 `static` （`Shared` Visual Basic）方法的调用，请在调用此方法时传入 `instance` 参数的 `null`。To represent a call to a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, pass in `null` for the `instance` parameter when you call this method. 如果 `method` 表示实例方法，则 `instance` 的 属性必须分配给 `method`所表示的方法的声明类型。If `method` represents an instance method, the property of `instance` must be assignable to the declaring type of the method represented by `method`. 生成的 的 属性为空。The property of the resulting is empty. 属性等于 `method`所表示的方法的返回类型。The property is equal to the return type of the method represented by `method`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个表达式，该表达式调用不带参数的方法。The following code example shows how to create an expression that calls a method without arguments. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未 `null``arguments`，则它必须具有与 `method`所表示的方法的参数数目相同的元素数目。If `arguments` is not `null`, it must have the same number of elements as the number of parameters for the method represented by `method`. `arguments` 中的每个元素都不能 `null` 并且必须可分配给 `method`的相应参数，可能在加*引号*后。Each element in `arguments` must not be `null` and must be assignable to the corresponding parameter of `method`, possibly after *quoting*. > [!NOTE] > 仅当对应的方法参数为类型 时，才会将元素括起来。An element will be quoted only if the corresponding method parameter is of type . 引号表示元素包装在 节点中。Quoting means the element is wrapped in a node. 生成的节点是一个 ，其 属性是 `arguments`的元素。The resulting node is a whose property is the element of `arguments`. 如果 `null``arguments`，则生成的 的 属性为空。The property of the resulting is empty if `arguments` is `null`. 否则，它包含与 `arguments`相同的元素，其中的某些元素可能括在引号中。Otherwise, it contains the same elements as `arguments`, some of which may be quoted. 生成的 的 属性等于 `method`所表示的方法的返回类型。The property of the resulting is equal to the return type of the method represented by `method`. 属性为 `null`。The property is `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成的 的 属性被设置为实现方法。The property of the resulting is set to the implementing method. 属性为 `false`。The property is `false`. 如果节点已提升，则 `true`。If the node is lifted, is `true`. 否则为 `false`。Otherwise, it is `false`. #### 实现方法Implementing Method 以下规则确定操作的实现方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果 `expression`，则为。Type 或 `type` 是定义隐式转换或显式转换运算符的用户定义类型，表示该运算符的 是实现方法。If either `expression`.Type or `type` is a user-defined type that defines an implicit or explicit conversion operator, the that represents that operator is the implementing method. - 否则：Otherwise: - 如果 `expression`，则为。类型和 `type` 表示数字或布尔类型，或可为 null 或不可为 null 的枚举类型，实现方法是 `null`的。If both `expression`.Type and `type` represent numeric or Boolean types, or nullable or non-nullable enumeration types, the implementing method is `null`. - 如果 `expression`，则为。类型或 `type` 是引用类型，并且存在来自 `expression`的显式装箱、取消装箱或引用转换。键入到 `type`，则实现方法为 `null`。If either `expression`.Type or `type` is a reference type and an explicit boxing, unboxing, or reference conversion exists from `expression`.Type to `type`, the implementing method is `null`. #### 提升和非提升Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果不 `null`实现方法：If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果 `expression`。Type 可分配给实现方法的参数类型，实现方法的返回类型可分配给 `type`，不会提升节点。If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method and the return type of the implementing method is assignable to `type`, the node is not lifted. - 如果 `expression`中的一个或两个。Type 或 `type` 是可以为 null 的值类型，并且相应的不可以为 null 的值类型分别等于实现方法的参数类型和返回类型，则会提升节点。If one or both of `expression`.Type or `type` is a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable value types are equal to the argument type and the return type of the implementing method respectively, the node is lifted. 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果 `expression`，则为。类型和 `type` 不可为 null，则不提升节点。If both `expression`.Type and `type` are non-nullable, the node is not lifted. - 否则，节点将被提升。Otherwise the node is lifted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建表示类型转换运算的表达式。The following code example shows how to create an expression that represents a type conversion operation. 否则为。Type 或 `type` 是定义隐式转换或显式转换运算符的用户定义类型，表示该运算符的 是实现方法。Otherwise, if either `expression`.Type or `type` is a user-defined type that defines an implicit or explicit conversion operator, the that represents that operator is the implementing method. - 否则：Otherwise: - 如果 `expression`，则为。类型和 `type` 表示数字或布尔类型，或可为 null 或不可为 null 的枚举类型，实现方法是 `null`的。If both `expression`.Type and `type` represent numeric or Boolean types, or nullable or non-nullable enumeration types, the implementing method is `null`. - 如果 `expression`，则为。类型或 `type` 是引用类型，并且存在来自 `expression`的显式装箱、取消装箱或引用转换。键入到 `type`，则实现方法为 `null`。If either `expression`.Type or `type` is a reference type and an explicit boxing, unboxing, or reference conversion exists from `expression`.Type to `type`, the implementing method is `null`. #### 提升和非提升Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果不 `null`实现方法：If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果 `expression`。Type 可分配给实现方法的参数类型，实现方法的返回类型可分配给 `type`，不会提升节点。If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method and the return type of the implementing method is assignable to `type`, the node is not lifted. - 如果 `expression`中的一个或两个。类型或 `type` 是可以为 null 的值类型，并且相应的不可为 null 的值类型分别等于实现方法的参数类型和返回类型，节点将被提升。If either or both of `expression`.Type or `type` are a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable value types are equal to the argument type and the return type of the implementing method respectively, the node is lifted. 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果 `expression`，则为。类型和 `type` 不可为 null，则不提升节点。If both `expression`.Type and `type` are non-nullable, the node is not lifted. - 否则，节点将被提升。Otherwise the node is lifted.

如果 `left` 或 `right` 的 属性表示重载除法运算符的用户定义类型，则表示该方法的 是实现方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the division operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否则，如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为 `null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 节点类型和提升和非提升Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果不 `null`实现方法：If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型可分配给实现方法的相应参数类型，不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果满足以下两个条件，则会提升节点，并且该节点的类型为与实现方法的返回类型对应的可以为 null 的类型：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型既是值类型，其中至少有一个可为 null，并且相应的不可为 null 的类型等于实现方法的相应参数类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型不可以为 null，则不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型为预定义除法运算符的结果类型。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined division operator. - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型均可为 null，则提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 节点的类型是与预定义除法运算符的结果类型对应的可以为 null 的类型。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined division operator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个表达式，该表达式将其第一个自变量除以其第二个自变量。The following code example shows how to create an expression that divides its first argument by its second argument. remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成的 具有设置为实现方法的 属性。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 属性设置为节点的类型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果节点已提升，则 和 属性均 `true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否则，它们 `false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 属性为 `null`。The property is `null`. 以下信息描述了实现方法、节点类型以及节点是否已提升。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 实现方法Implementing Method 以下规则确定操作的实现方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果 `method` 未 `null` 并且它表示采用两个自变量的非 void、`static``Shared` （Visual Basic）方法，则它是节点的实现方法。If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node. - 否则，如果 `left` 或 `right` 的 属性表示重载除法运算符的用户定义类型，则表示该方法的 是实现方法。Otherwise, if the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the division operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否则，如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为 `null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 节点类型和提升和非提升Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果不 `null`实现方法：If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型可分配给实现方法的相应参数类型，不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果满足以下两个条件，则会提升节点，并且该节点的类型为与实现方法的返回类型对应的可以为 null 的类型：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型既是值类型，其中至少有一个可为 null，并且相应的不可为 null 的类型等于实现方法的相应参数类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型不可以为 null，则不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型为预定义除法运算符的结果类型。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined division operator. - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型均可为 null，则提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 节点的类型是与预定义除法运算符的结果类型对应的可以为 null 的类型。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined division operator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `addMethod` 参数必须表示名为 "Add" （不区分大小写）的实例方法。The `addMethod` parameter must represent an instance method named "Add" (case insensitive). Add 方法的参数数目必须与 `arguments`中的元素数相同。The add method must have the same number of parameters as the number of elements in `arguments`. `arguments` 中每个元素的 属性都必须分配给添加方法的对应参数的类型，可能在加*引号*后。The property of each element in `arguments` must be assignable to the type of the corresponding parameter of the add method, possibly after *quoting*. > [!NOTE] > 仅当对应的方法参数为类型 时，才会将元素括起来。An element will be quoted only if the corresponding method parameter is of type . 引号表示元素包装在 节点中。Quoting means the element is wrapped in a node. 生成的节点是一个 ，其 属性是 `arguments`的元素。The resulting node is a whose property is the element of `arguments`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法创建一个表示调用 方法以初始化字典集合的元素的 。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create an that represents calling the method to initialize an element of a dictionary collection. remarks.format: ## Remarks `addMethod` 参数必须表示名为 "Add" （不区分大小写）的实例方法。The `addMethod` parameter must represent an instance method named "Add" (case insensitive). Add 方法的参数数目必须与 `arguments`中的元素数相同。The add method must have the same number of parameters as the number of elements in `arguments`. `arguments` 中每个元素的 属性都必须分配给添加方法的对应参数的类型，可能在加*引号*后。The property of each element in `arguments` must be assignable to the type of the corresponding parameter of the add method, possibly after *quoting*. > [!NOTE] > 仅当对应的方法参数为类型 时，才会将元素括起来。An element will be quoted only if the corresponding method parameter is of type . 引号表示元素包装在 节点中。Quoting means the element is wrapped in a node. 生成的节点是一个 ，其 属性是 `arguments`的元素。The resulting node is a whose property is the element of `arguments`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法创建一个表示调用 方法以初始化字典集合的元素的 。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create an that represents calling the method to initialize an element of a dictionary collection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要表达式，但不需要执行任何操作，则可以使用空表达式。An empty expression can be used where an expression is expected but no action is desired. 例如，你可以使用空表达式作为块表达式中的最后一个表达式。For example, you can use an empty expression as the last expression in a block expression. 在这种情况下，块表达式的返回值为 void。In this case, the block expression's return value is void. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个空表达式并将其添加到块表达式。The following code example shows how to create an empty expression and add it to a block expression. remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成的 具有设置为实现方法的 属性。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 属性设置为节点的类型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果节点已提升，则 `true` 属性。If the node is lifted, the property is `true`. 否则为 `false`。Otherwise, it is `false`. 属性始终为 `false`。The property is always `false`. 以下信息描述了实现方法、节点类型以及节点是否已提升。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 实现方法Implementing Method 以下规则确定操作的实现方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果 `left` 或 `right` 的 属性表示重载相等运算符的用户定义的类型，则表示该方法的 是实现方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the equality operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否则，实现方法为 `null`。Otherwise, the implementing method is `null`. #### 节点类型和提升和非提升Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果不 `null`实现方法：If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型可分配给实现方法的相应参数类型，不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果满足以下两个条件，则会提升节点并 节点的类型：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is : - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型既是值类型，其中至少有一个可为 null，并且相应的不可为 null 的类型等于实现方法的相应参数类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 实现方法的返回类型为 。The return type of the implementing method is . 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型不可以为 null，则不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型为 。The type of the node is . - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型均可为 null，则提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 节点的类型为 。The type of the node is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个表达式，用于检查其两个参数的值是否相等。The following code example shows how to create an expression that checks whether the values of its two arguments are equal. also, the type of the node is nullable if `liftToNull` is `true` or if `liftToNull` is `false`: - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型既是值类型，其中至少有一个可为 null，并且相应的不可为 null 的类型等于实现方法的相应参数类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 实现方法的返回类型为 。The return type of the implementing method is . 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型不可以为 null，则不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型为 。The type of the node is . - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型均可为 null，则提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 如果 `liftToNull` `true`，则节点的类型可以为 null 如果 `liftToNull` `false`，则为 。The type of the node is nullable if `liftToNull` is `true` or if `liftToNull` is `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成的 具有设置为实现方法的 属性。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 属性设置为节点的类型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果节点已提升，则 和 属性均 `true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否则，它们 `false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 属性为 `null`。The property is `null`. 以下信息描述了实现方法、节点类型以及节点是否已提升。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 实现方法Implementing Method 以下规则确定操作的实现方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果 `left` 或 `right` 的 属性表示重载 `XOR` 运算符的用户定义类型，则表示该方法的 是实现方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the `XOR` operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否则，如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型为整型或布尔类型，则实现方法为 `null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are integral or Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 节点类型和提升和非提升Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果不 `null`实现方法：If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型可分配给实现方法的相应参数类型，不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果满足以下两个条件，则会提升节点，并且该节点的类型为与实现方法的返回类型对应的可以为 null 的类型：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型既是值类型，其中至少有一个可为 null，并且相应的不可为 null 的类型等于实现方法的相应参数类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型不可以为 null，则不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是预定义的 `XOR` 运算符的结果类型。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined `XOR` operator. - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型均可为 null，则提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 节点的类型是与预定义 `XOR` 运算符的结果类型对应的可以为 null 的类型。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined `XOR` operator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建表示逻辑 XOR 运算的表达式。The following code example shows how to create an expression that represents the logical XOR operation. 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型不可以为 null，则不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是预定义的 `XOR` 运算符的结果类型。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined `XOR` operator. - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型均可为 null，则提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 节点的类型是与预定义 `XOR` 运算符的结果类型对应的可以为 null 的类型。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined `XOR` operator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从此函数返回的对象的类型为 。The object that is returned from this function is of type . 类型用于表示返回的对象，因为 lambda 表达式的具体类型在编译时是未知的。The type is used to represent the returned object because the concrete type of the lambda expression is not known at compile time. `delegateType` 表示的委托类型的参数数目必须等于 `parameters`的长度。The number of parameters for the delegate type represented by`delegateType` must equal the length of `parameters`. `parameters` 的元素必须是与 `body`中的参数表达式相等的引用。The elements of `parameters` must be reference equal to the parameter expressions in `body`. 生成的对象的 属性等于 `delegateType`。The property of the resulting object is equal to `delegateType`. 如果 `null``parameters`，则生成的对象的 属性为空集合。If `parameters` is `null`, the property of the resulting object is an empty collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个表达式，该表达式表示将1添加到传递的自变量的 lambda 表达式。The following example demonstrates how to create an expression that represents a lambda expression that adds 1 to the passed argument. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionDev10#42](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.linq.expressions.expressiondev10/cs/program.cs#42)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionDev10#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.linq.expressions.expressiondev10/vb/module1.vb#42)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委托类型 `TDelegate` 的参数数目必须等于 `parameters`中的元素数目。The number of parameters for the delegate type `TDelegate` must equal the number of elements in `parameters`. `parameters` 的元素必须是与`body`中的参数表达式相等的引用。The elements of `parameters` must be reference equal to the parameter expressions in`body`. 生成的对象的 属性表示 `TDelegate`类型。The property of the resulting object represents the type `TDelegate`. 如果 `null``parameters`，则生成的对象的 属性为空集合。If `parameters` is `null`, the property of the resulting object is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成的 具有设置为实现方法的 属性。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 属性设置为节点的类型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果节点已提升，则 和 属性均 `true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否则，它们 `false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 属性为 `null`。The property is `null`. 以下信息描述了实现方法、节点类型以及节点是否已提升。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 实现方法Implementing Method 以下规则确定为操作选定的实现方法：The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation: - 如果 `left` 或 `right` 的 属性表示重载左移位运算符的用户定义类型，则表示该方法的 是实现方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the left-shift operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否则，如果 `left`。类型为整型类型（、、、、、、、或对应的可以为 null 的类型）和 `right`。类型为 ，则实现方法为 `null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type is an integral type (one of , , , , , , , , or the corresponding nullable types) and `right`.Type is , the implementing method is `null`. #### 节点类型和提升和非提升Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果不 `null`实现方法：If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型可分配给实现方法的相应参数类型，不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果满足以下两个条件，则会提升节点，并且该节点的类型为与实现方法的返回类型对应的可以为 null 的类型：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型既是值类型，其中至少有一个可为 null，并且相应的不可为 null 的类型等于实现方法的相应参数类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型不可以为 null，则不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是预定义的左移运算符的结果类型。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined left-shift operator. - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型均可为 null，则提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 节点的类型是与预定义左移位运算符的结果类型相对应的可为 null 的类型。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined left-shift operator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成的 具有设置为实现方法的 属性。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 属性设置为节点的类型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果节点已提升，则 `true` 属性。If the node is lifted, the property is `true`. 否则为 `false`。Otherwise, it is `false`. 属性始终为 `false`。The property is always `false`. 属性为 `null`。The property is `null`. 以下信息描述了实现方法、节点类型以及节点是否已提升。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 实现方法Implementing Method 根据以下规则选择操作的实现方法：The implementing method for the operation is chosen based on the following rules: - 如果 `left` 或 `right` 的 属性表示重载 "小于" 运算符的用户定义类型，则表示该方法的 是实现方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the "less than" operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否则，如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为 `null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 节点类型和提升和非提升Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果不 `null`实现方法：If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型可分配给实现方法的相应参数类型，不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果满足以下两个条件，则会提升节点并 节点的类型：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is : - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型既是值类型，其中至少有一个可为 null，并且相应的不可为 null 的类型等于实现方法的相应参数类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 实现方法的返回类型为 。The return type of the implementing method is . 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型不可以为 null，则不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型为 。The type of the node is . - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型均可为 null，则提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 节点的类型为 。The type of the node is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建对两个整数进行比较的表达式。The following code example shows how to create an expression that compares two integers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成的 具有设置为实现方法的 属性。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 属性设置为节点的类型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果节点已提升，则 和 属性均 `true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否则，它们 `false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 属性为 `null`。The property is `null`. 以下信息描述了实现方法、节点类型以及节点是否已提升。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 实现方法Implementing Method 以下规则确定为操作选定的实现方法：The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation: - 如果 `left` 或 `right` 的 属性表示重载取模运算符的用户定义类型，则表示该方法的 是实现方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the modulus operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否则，如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为 `null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 节点类型和提升和非提升Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果不 `null`实现方法：If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型可分配给实现方法的相应参数类型，不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果满足以下两个条件，则会提升节点，并且该节点的类型为与实现方法的返回类型对应的可以为 null 的类型：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型既是值类型，其中至少有一个可为 null，并且相应的不可为 null 的类型等于实现方法的相应参数类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型不可以为 null，则不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型为预定义取模运算符的结果类型。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined modulus operator. - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型均可为 null，则提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 节点的类型是与预定义取模运算符的结果类型对应的可以为 null 的类型。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined modulus operator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成的 具有设置为实现方法的 属性。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 属性设置为节点的类型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果节点已提升，则 和 属性均 `true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否则，它们 `false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 属性为 `null`。The property is `null`. 以下信息描述了实现方法、节点类型以及节点是否已提升。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 实现方法Implementing Method 根据以下规则选择操作的实现方法：The implementing method for the operation is chosen based on the following rules: - 如果 `method` 未 `null` 并且它表示采用两个自变量的非 void、`static``Shared` （Visual Basic）方法，则它是节点的实现方法。If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node. - 否则，如果 `left` 或 `right` 的 属性表示重载取模运算符的用户定义类型，则表示该方法的 是实现方法。Otherwise, if the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the modulus operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否则，如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为 `null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 节点类型和提升和非提升Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果不 `null`实现方法：If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型可分配给实现方法的相应参数类型，不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果满足以下两个条件，则会提升节点，并且该节点的类型为与实现方法的返回类型对应的可以为 null 的类型：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型既是值类型，其中至少有一个可为 null，并且相应的不可为 null 的类型等于实现方法的相应参数类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型不可以为 null，则不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型为预定义取模运算符的结果类型。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined modulus operator. - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型均可为 null，则提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 节点的类型是与预定义取模运算符的结果类型对应的可以为 null 的类型。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined modulus operator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成的 具有设置为实现方法的 属性。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 属性设置为节点的类型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果节点已提升，则 和 属性均 `true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否则，它们 `false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 属性为 `null`。The property is `null`. 以下信息描述了实现方法、节点类型以及节点是否已提升。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 实现方法Implementing Method 以下规则确定为操作选定的实现方法：The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation: - 如果 `left` 或 `right` 的 属性表示重载乘法运算符的用户定义类型，则表示该方法的 是实现方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the multiplication operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否则，如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为 `null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 节点类型和提升和非提升Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果不 `null`实现方法：If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型可分配给实现方法的相应参数类型，不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果满足以下两个条件，则会提升节点，并且该节点的类型为与实现方法的返回类型对应的可以为 null 的类型：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型既是值类型，其中至少有一个可为 null，并且相应的不可为 null 的类型等于实现方法的相应参数类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型不可以为 null，则不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是预定义的乘法运算符的结果类型。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined multiplication operator. - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型均可为 null，则提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 节点的类型是与预定义乘法运算符的结果类型对应的可以为 null 的类型。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined multiplication operator.

如果 `expression`。类型可赋给实现方法的参数类型，不会提升节点。If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果满足以下两个条件，则会提升节点，并且该节点的类型为与实现方法的返回类型对应的可以为 null 的类型：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - remarks.format: ## Remarks `arguments` 参数必须包含与 `constructor`所表示的构造函数的参数数目相同的元素数目。The `arguments` parameter must contain the same number of elements as the number of parameters for the constructor represented by `constructor`. 如果 `null``arguments`，则将其视为空，并且生成的 的 属性为空集合。If `arguments` is `null`, it is considered empty, and the property of the resulting is an empty collection. 如果 `null``members`，则生成的 的 属性为空集合。If `members` is `null`, the property of the resulting is an empty collection. 如果未 `null``members`，则它必须具有与 `arguments` 相同的元素数，并且每个元素不能 `null`。If `members` is not `null`, it must have the same number of elements as `arguments` and each element must not be `null`. `members` 的每个元素必须是一个 、 或 ，表示 `constructor`所表示的构造函数的声明类型上的实例成员。Each element of `members` must be a , or that represents an instance member on the declaring type of the constructor represented by `constructor`. 如果它表示一个属性，则该属性必须能够检索关联字段的值。If it represents a property, the property must be able to retrieve the value of the associated field. `members` 的每个元素的 `arguments` 的相应元素必须具有一个 属性，该属性表示可分配给 `members` 元素表示的成员类型的类型。The corresponding element of `arguments` for each element of `members` must have a property that represents a type that is assignable to the type of the member that the `members` element represents. 生成的 的 属性表示 `constructor` 表示的构造函数的声明类型。The property of the resulting represents the declaring type of the constructor that `constructor` represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供了更专用于其派生类型的 的说明。The property provides a more specialized description of an than just its derived type. 例如，可以使用 来表示多种不同类型的二进制表达式，如除法运算或 "大于" 运算。For example, a can be used to represent many different kinds of binary expressions, such as a division operation or a "greater than" operation. 属性会将这些二进制表达式分别描述为 和 。The property would describe these binary expressions as and , respectively. 对象表示的表达式的静态 CLR 类型由 属性表示。The static CLR type of the expression that the object represents is represented by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成的 的 属性被设置为实现方法。The property of the resulting is set to the implementing method. 属性设置为节点的类型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果节点已提升，则 和 属性均 `true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否则，它们 `false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. #### 实现方法Implementing Method 以下规则确定操作的实现方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果 `expression`。类型是一种定义一元 not 运算符的用户定义类型，表示该运算符的 是实现方法。If `expression`.Type is a user-defined type that defines the unary not operator, the that represents that operator is the implementing method. - 否则，如果 `expression`。Type 为数值或布尔类型，则实现方法为 `null`。Otherwise, if `expression`.Type is a numeric or Boolean type, the implementing method is `null`. #### 节点类型和提升和非提升Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果不 `null`实现方法：If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果 `expression`。类型可赋给实现方法的参数类型，不会提升节点。If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果满足以下两个条件，则会提升节点，并且该节点的类型为与实现方法的返回类型对应的可以为 null 的类型：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `expression`。类型是可以为 null 的值类型，并且相应的不可为 null 的类型等于实现方法的参数类型。`expression`.Type is a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable type is equal to the argument type of the implementing method. - 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果实现方法为 `null`，则 `expression`节点的类型。类别.If the implementing method is `null`, the type of the node is `expression`.Type. 如果 `expression`。类型不可为 null，则不提升节点。If `expression`.Type is non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 否则，节点会提升。Otherwise, the node is lifted. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建表示逻辑 "非" 运算的表达式。The following example demonstrates how to create an expression that represents a logical NOT operation. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionDev10#51](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.linq.expressions.expressiondev10/cs/program.cs#51)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionDev10#51](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.linq.expressions.expressiondev10/vb/module1.vb#51)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成的 具有设置为实现方法的 属性。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 属性设置为节点的类型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果节点已提升，则 和 属性均 `true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否则，它们 `false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 属性为 `null`。The property is `null`. 以下信息描述了实现方法、节点类型以及节点是否已提升。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 实现方法Implementing Method 以下规则确定操作的实现方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果 `left` 或 `right` 的 属性表示重载按位 `OR` 运算符的用户定义类型，则表示该方法的 是实现方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the bitwise `OR` operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否则，如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型为整型或布尔类型，则实现方法为 `null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are integral or Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 节点类型和提升和非提升Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果不 `null`实现方法：If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型可分配给实现方法的相应参数类型，不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果满足以下两个条件，则会提升节点，并且该节点的类型为与实现方法的返回类型对应的可以为 null 的类型：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型既是值类型，其中至少有一个可为 null，并且相应的不可为 null 的类型等于实现方法的相应参数类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型不可以为 null，则不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型为预定义的按位 `OR` 运算符的结果类型。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined bitwise `OR` operator. - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型均可为 null，则提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 节点的类型是与预定义的按位 `OR` 运算符的结果类型对应的可以为 null 的类型。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined bitwise `OR` operator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建表示逻辑或运算的表达式。The following code example shows how to create an expression that represents a logical OR operation. remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成的 具有设置为实现方法的 属性。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 属性设置为节点的类型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果节点已提升，则 和 属性均 `true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否则，它们 `false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 属性为 `null`。The property is `null`. 以下信息描述了实现方法、节点类型以及节点是否已提升。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 实现方法Implementing Method 以下规则确定操作的实现方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果 `left` 或 `right` 的 属性表示重载按位 `OR` 运算符的用户定义类型，则表示该方法的 是实现方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the bitwise `OR` operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. > [!NOTE] > 不能在或 Visual Basic 中C#重载条件 `OR` 运算符。The conditional `OR` operator cannot be overloaded in C# or Visual Basic. 不过，条件 `OR` 运算符使用按位 `OR` 运算符进行计算。However, the conditional `OR` operator is evaluated by using the bitwise `OR` operator. 因此，按位 `OR` 运算符的用户定义的重载可以是此节点类型的实现方法。Thus, a user-defined overload of the bitwise `OR` operator can be the implementing method for this node type. - 否则，如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型是布尔类型，则实现方法为 `null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are Boolean types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 节点类型和提升和非提升Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果不 `null`实现方法：If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型可分配给实现方法的相应参数类型，不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果满足以下两个条件，则会提升节点，并且该节点的类型为与实现方法的返回类型对应的可以为 null 的类型：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型既是值类型，其中至少有一个可为 null，并且相应的不可为 null 的类型等于实现方法的相应参数类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable, and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型是相同的布尔类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are the same Boolean type. - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型不可为 null，则不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是预定义的条件 `OR` 运算符的结果类型。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined conditional `OR` operator. - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型可以为 null，则提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are nullable, the node is lifted. 节点的类型是与预定义条件 `OR` 运算符的结果类型对应的可以为 null 的类型。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined conditional `OR` operator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个表达式，该表达式表示仅在第一个操作数的计算结果为 `false`时才计算第二个操作数的逻辑 `OR` 运算。The following code example shows how to create an expression that represents a logical `OR` operation that evaluates the second operand only if the first operand evaluates to `false`. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionDev10#29](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.linq.expressions.expressiondev10/cs/program.cs#29)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionDev10#29](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.linq.expressions.expressiondev10/vb/module1.vb#29)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成的 具有设置为实现方法的 属性。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 属性设置为节点的类型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果节点已提升，则 和 属性均 `true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否则，它们 `false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 属性为 `null`。The property is `null`. 以下信息描述了实现方法、节点类型以及节点是否已提升。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 实现方法Implementing Method 以下规则确定操作的实现方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果 `method` 未 `null` 并且它表示采用两个自变量的非 void、`static``Shared` （Visual Basic）方法，则它是实现方法。If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method. - 否则，如果 `left` 或 `right` 的 属性表示重载求幂运算符的用户定义类型，则表示该方法的 是实现方法。Otherwise, if the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the exponentiation operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否则，如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型均 ，则实现方法 。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both , the implementing method is . #### 节点类型和提升和非提升Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型可分配给实现方法的相应参数类型，不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果满足以下两个条件，则会提升节点，并且该节点的类型为与实现方法的返回类型对应的可以为 null 的类型：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型既是值类型，其中至少有一个可为 null，并且相应的不可为 null 的类型等于实现方法的相应参数类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成的 具有设置为实现方法的 属性。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 属性设置为节点的类型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果节点已提升，则 和 属性均 `true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否则，它们 `false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 属性为 `null`。The property is `null`. 以下信息描述了实现方法、节点类型以及节点是否已提升。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 实现方法Implementing Method 以下规则确定为操作选定的实现方法：The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation: - 如果 `left` 或 `right` 的 属性表示重载右移位运算符的用户定义类型，则表示该方法的 是实现方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the right-shift operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否则，如果 `left`。类型为整型类型（、、、、、、、或对应的可以为 null 的类型）和 `right`。类型为 ，则实现方法为 `null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type is an integral type (one of , , , , , , , , or the corresponding nullable types) and `right`.Type is , the implementing method is `null`. #### 节点类型和提升和非提升Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果不 `null`实现方法：If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型可分配给实现方法的相应参数类型，不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果满足以下两个条件，则会提升节点，并且该节点的类型为与实现方法的返回类型对应的可以为 null 的类型：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型既是值类型，其中至少有一个可为 null，并且相应的不可为 null 的类型等于实现方法的相应参数类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型不可以为 null，则不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型为预定义右移位运算符的结果类型。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined right-shift operator. - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型均可为 null，则提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 节点的类型是与预定义右移位运算符的结果类型对应的可以为 null 的类型。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined right-shift operator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成的 具有设置为实现方法的 属性。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 属性设置为节点的类型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果节点已提升，则 和 属性均 `true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否则，它们 `false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 属性为 `null`。The property is `null`. 以下信息描述了实现方法、节点类型以及节点是否已提升。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 实现方法Implementing Method 以下规则确定为操作选定的实现方法：The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation: - 如果 `method` 未 `null` 并且它表示采用两个自变量的非 void、`static``Shared` （Visual Basic）方法，则它是节点的实现方法。If `method` is not `null` and it represents a non-void, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method that takes two arguments, it is the implementing method for the node. - 否则，如果 `left` 或 `right` 的 属性表示重载右移位运算符的用户定义的类型，则表示该方法的 是实现方法。Otherwise, if the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the right-shift operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否则，如果 `left`。类型为整型类型（、、、、、、、或对应的可以为 null 的类型）和 `right`。类型为 ，则实现方法为 `null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type is an integral type (one of , , , , , , , , or the corresponding nullable types) and `right`.Type is , the implementing method is `null`. #### 节点类型和提升和非提升Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果不 `null`实现方法：If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型可分配给实现方法的相应参数类型，不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果满足以下两个条件，则会提升节点，并且该节点的类型为与实现方法的返回类型对应的可以为 null 的类型：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型既是值类型，其中至少有一个可为 null，并且相应的不可为 null 的类型等于实现方法的相应参数类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型不可以为 null，则不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型为预定义右移位运算符的结果类型。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined right-shift operator. - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型均可为 null，则提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 节点的类型是与预定义右移位运算符的结果类型对应的可以为 null 的类型。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined right-shift operator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成的 具有设置为实现方法的 属性。The resulting has the property set to the implementing method. 属性设置为节点的类型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果节点已提升，则 和 属性均 `true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否则，它们 `false`。Otherwise, they are `false`. 属性为 `null`。The property is `null`. 以下信息描述了实现方法、节点类型以及节点是否已提升。The following information describes the implementing method, the node type, and whether a node is lifted. #### 实现方法Implementing Method 以下规则确定为操作选定的实现方法：The following rules determine the selected implementing method for the operation: - 如果 `left` 或 `right` 的 属性表示重载减法运算符的用户定义类型，则表示该方法的 是实现方法。If the property of either `left` or `right` represents a user-defined type that overloads the subtraction operator, the that represents that method is the implementing method. - 否则，如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型为数值类型，则实现方法为 `null`。Otherwise, if `left`.Type and `right`.Type are numeric types, the implementing method is `null`. #### 节点类型和提升和非提升Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果不 `null`实现方法：If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型可分配给实现方法的相应参数类型，不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are assignable to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果满足以下两个条件，则会提升节点，并且该节点的类型为与实现方法的返回类型对应的可以为 null 的类型：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `left`。键入并 `right`。类型既是值类型，其中至少有一个可为 null，并且相应的不可为 null 的类型等于实现方法的相应参数类型。`left`.Type and `right`.Type are both value types of which at least one is nullable and the corresponding non-nullable types are equal to the corresponding argument types of the implementing method. - 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果实现方法为 `null`：If the implementing method is `null`: - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型不可以为 null，则不提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型为预定义减法运算符的结果类型。The type of the node is the result type of the predefined subtraction operator. - 如果 `left`。键入并 `right`。类型均可为 null，则提升节点。If `left`.Type and `right`.Type are both nullable, the node is lifted. 节点的类型是与预定义减法运算符的结果类型对应的可以为 null 的类型。The type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the result type of the predefined subtraction operator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象中的所有 对象都必须具有相同的类型，除非 的类型 `void`。All objects in a object must have the same type, unless the has the type `void`. 每个 对象都具有一个隐式 `break` 语句，这意味着没有从一个 case 标签到另一个 case 标签的隐式贯穿。Each object has an implicit `break` statement, which means that there is no implicit fall through from one case label to another. 如果 `switchValue` 与任何情况都不匹配，则不会引发异常。If `switchValue` does not match any of the cases, no exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个表达式，该表达式表示不带默认大小写的 switch 语句。The following example demonstrates how to create an expression that represents a switch statement without a default case. remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象中的所有 对象都必须具有相同的类型，除非 的类型 `void`。All objects in a object must have the same type, unless the has the type `void`. 每个 对象都具有一个隐式 `break` 语句，这意味着没有从一个 case 标签到另一个 case 标签的隐式贯穿。Each object has an implicit `break` statement, which means that there is no implicit fall through from one case label to another. 如果 `switchValue` 与任何情况都不匹配，则运行 `defaultBody` 所表示的默认事例。If `switchValue` does not match any of the cases, the default case represented by `defaultBody` is run. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个表达式，该表达式表示具有默认情况的 switch 语句。The following example demonstrates how to create an expression that represents a switch statement that has a default case. remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象中的所有 对象都必须具有相同的类型，除非 的类型 `void`。All objects in a object must have the same type, unless the has the type `void`. 每个 对象都具有一个隐式 `break` 语句，这意味着没有从一个 case 标签到另一个 case 标签的隐式贯穿。Each object has an implicit `break` statement, which means that there is no implicit fall through from one case label to another. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个表达式，该表达式表示具有默认情况的 switch 语句。The following example demonstrates how to create an expression that represents a switch statement that has a default case. remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成的 的 属性被设置为实现方法。The property of the resulting is set to the implementing method. 属性设置为节点的类型。The property is set to the type of the node. 如果节点已提升，则 和 属性均 `true`。If the node is lifted, the and properties are both `true`. 否则为 false。Otherwise, they are false. #### 实现方法Implementing Method 以下规则确定操作的实现方法：The following rules determine the implementing method for the operation: - 如果 `expression`。类型是定义一元加号运算符的用户定义类型，则表示该运算符的 是实现方法。If `expression`.Type is a user-defined type that defines the unary plus operator, the that represents that operator is the implementing method. - 否则，如果 `expression`。Type 为数值类型，则实现方法为 `null`。Otherwise, if `expression`.Type is a numeric type, the implementing method is `null`. #### 节点类型和提升和非提升Node Type and Lifted versus Non-Lifted 如果不 `null`实现方法：If the implementing method is not `null`: - 如果 `expression`。类型可赋给实现方法的参数类型，不会提升节点。If `expression`.Type is assignable to the argument type of the implementing method, the node is not lifted. 节点的类型是实现方法的返回类型。The type of the node is the return type of the implementing method. - 如果满足以下两个条件，则会提升节点，并且该节点的类型为与实现方法的返回类型对应的可以为 null 的类型：If the following two conditions are satisfied, the node is lifted and the type of the node is the nullable type that corresponds to the return type of the implementing method: - `expression`。类型是可以为 null 的值类型，并且相应的不可为 null 的值类型等于实现方法的参数类型。`expression`.Type is a nullable value type and the corresponding non-nullable value type is equal to the argument type of the implementing method. - 实现方法的返回类型是不可为 null 的值类型。The return type of the implementing method is a non-nullable value type. 如果实现方法为 `null`，则 `expression`节点的类型。类别.If the implementing method is `null`, the type of the node is `expression`.Type. 如果 `expression`。类型不可为 null，则不提升节点。If `expression`.Type is non-nullable, the node is not lifted. 否则，节点会提升。Otherwise, the node is lifted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写此方法可提供逻辑来遍历节点的子节点。Override this method to provide logic to walk the node's children. 典型的实现将调用访问者。访问其每个子项，如果其中任何一个项发生更改，则应使用修改后的子级返回其自身的新副本。A typical implementation will call visitor.Visit on each of its children, and if any of them change, should return a new copy of itself with the modified children.
